title: The Power of Genetics
description:
How to make the power of your habits manipulate the power of your genes. Finding the best fitness tracker. Proper form for chattarunga. And tips on when to start supplementing.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
